question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew holds a wriggling echidna at the Taronga Zoo in Sydney, Australia.)  Naturally, Sydney's Taronga Zoo has a distinctly Australian echidna; an echidna named Millie, short for "millennium", was a mascot in the summer Olympic games in this year
